dashboardconfig.description: A Dashboard which allows to show costs split by an EC2 Tag "Usage". By setting this tag on EC2 Instances, estimated costs can be visualized by "Theme" and thus allow more fine grained cost monitoring.
dashboardconfig.name: Amazon Cost by Usage

portletconfig.name: Dynamic Measure Matrix - EC2 Instance Costs per Theme

portletconfig.description: Average number of instances allocated for a theme
portletconfig.name: Amazon EC2 Instance per Theme this month

portletconfig.description: Accumulated cost this month per Theme
portletconfig.name: Amazon EC2 Instance Costs per Theme
Dynamic Measure Matrix - EC2 Instances per Theme
